content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am pleased to offer you the opportunity to rent my apartment in Munich. I believe it is an excellent investment for you. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I am looking for an affordable apartment. I am willing to pay 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's an interesting offer, Haoyu. However, considering the prime location of the apartment and the recent construction, I was expecting a higher offer. I think 500 Euro per month is too low for this property. Can you reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I am willing to pay 600 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 600 Euro per month is a more reasonable offer, considering the market value of similar apartments in the area. However, I still believe that this apartment deserves a higher price. Can you go up a bit?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your explanation. Considering your explanation, I am willing to pay 650 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 650 Euro per month is a step in the right direction. While it's closer to my expectations, I still think this apartment is worth more. Would you be able to go up to 700 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Considering your explanation, I am willing to pay 700 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! 700 Euro per month is a fair price for this apartment. I am willing to accept this offer. I agree to the price of 700 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
